publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-590 Dr Elaine Murray: Turner Diaries—That the Parliament expresses its grave concern that Waterstone’s bookshops are stocking The Turner Diaries and requests that it be removed from sale.
S1M-590 Dr Elaine Murray: Turner Diaries—That the Parliament expresses its grave concern that Waterstone’s bookshops are stocking The Turner Diaries and requests that it be removed from sale.
S1M-590 Turner Diaries (lodged on 23 February 2000) Shona Robison*, Helen Eadie*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*
S1M-590 Turner Diaries (lodged on 23 February 2000) Trish Godman*

S1M-590 Dr Elaine Murray: Turner Diaries—That the Parliament expresses its grave concern that Waterstone’s bookshops are stocking The Turner Diaries and requests that it be removed from sale. Supported by: Shona Robison, Helen Eadie, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Trish Godman
S1M-590 Turner Diaries (lodged on 23 February 2000) Dr Winnie Ewing*

S1M-590 Dr Elaine Murray: Turner Diaries—That the Parliament expresses its grave concern that Waterstone’s bookshops are stocking The Turner Diaries and requests that it be removed from sale. Supported by: Shona Robison, Helen Eadie, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Trish Godman, Dr Winnie Ewing

S1M-590 Dr Elaine Murray: Turner Diaries—That the Parliament expresses its grave concern that Waterstone’s bookshops are stocking The Turner Diaries and requests that it be removed from sale. Supported by: Shona Robison, Helen Eadie, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Trish Godman, Dr Winnie Ewing
S1M-590 Turner Diaries (lodged on 23 February 2000) Alex Neil*

S1M-590 Dr Elaine Murray: Turner Diaries—That the Parliament expresses its grave concern that Waterstone’s bookshops are stocking The Turner Diaries and requests that it be removed from sale. Supported by: Shona Robison, Helen Eadie, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Trish Godman, Dr Winnie Ewing, Alex Neil

S1M-590 Dr Elaine Murray: Turner Diaries—That the Parliament expresses its grave concern that Waterstone’s bookshops are stocking The Turner Diaries and requests that it be removed from sale. Supported by: Shona Robison, Helen Eadie, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Trish Godman, Dr Winnie Ewing, Alex Neil
